ygData.subject: Re: The Alliance
ygData.msgSnippet: Motormaste clenches his fist at the interuption hardly able to contain his real mode like he was before. The joy ride wasnt enough for him to blow off steam.

Motormaste clenches his fist at the interuption hardly able to contain his
real mode like he was before. The joy ride wasnt enough for him to blow off
steam. "Shut up" he yelled at the composer sending a fist towards the
musical robots face.
